channel.title: Dr Banks on Linguistrix
channel.description: Recent content in Dr Banks on Linguistrix

item.title: Movie Review: Arrival
item.description: Arpan suggested that I review Arrival, a SciFi movie that has as its lead character—wait for it—a linguistics professor. I first thought of writing a review without spoilers but realized that it’d be impossible to write about the linguistically relevant parts of the movie without giving it all away, so I scrapped that plan. This review specifically addresses only and all linguistic aspects of the movie, so it might feel like nitpicking if you are not interested in all that stuff.
